data.title: All Harry Potter Book and Movie Differences
data.meta_description: There are plenty of differences between the books and movies throughout the Harry Potter series. We've compiled a list of the most noticeable differences.
data.text:
Buy: Harry Potter Products & Merchandise

Buy: Harry Potter Products & Merchandise

The Harry Potter universe expands across many forms of media, from books to films to video games. While each form tells the same story, there were many changes made when the books were adapted into movies. Those who read the books know just how much was cut from the film. In this article, we're covering the biggest difference between the books and film, broken up by book and chapter. So grab yourself a pint of Butterbeer, sit back, and enjoy!

Harry Potter and the Sorcerers Stone Book and Movie Differences

Chapter 1: The Boy Who Lived

Chapter 2: The Vanishing Glass

Chapter 3: The Letters From No One

Chapter 4: The Keeper of Keys

Chapter 5: Diagon Alley

Chapter 6: The Journey From Platform Nine and Three-Quarters

Chapter 7: The Sorting Hat

Chapter 8: The Potions Master

Chapter 9: The Midnight Duel

Chapter 10: Halloween

Chapter 11: Quidditch

Chapter 12: The Mirror of Erised

Chapter 13: Nicolas Flamel

Chapter 14: Norbert the Norwegian Ridgeback

Chapter 15: The Forbidden Forest

Chapter 16: Through the Trapdoor

Chapter 17: The Man with Two Faces

Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets Book and Movie Differences

Chapter 1: The Worst Birthday

Chapter 2: Dobbys Warning

Chapter 3: The Burrow

Chapter 4: Flourish and Blotts

Chapter 5: The Whomping Willow

Chapter 6: Gilderoy Lockhart

Chapter 7: Mudbloods and Murmurs

Chapter 8: The Deathday Party

Chapter 9: The Writing on the Wall

Chapter 10: The Rogue Bludger

Chapter 11: The Duelling Club

Chapter 12: The Polyjuice Potion

Chapter 13: The Very Secret Diary

Chapter 14: Cornelius Fudge

Chapter 15: Aragog

Chapter 16: The Chamber of Secrets

Chapter 17: The Heir of Slytherin

Chapter 18: Dobbys Reward

Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban Book and Movie Differences

Chapter 1: Owl Post

Chapter 2: Aunt Marges Big Mistake

Chapter 3: The Knight Bus

Chapter 4: The Leaky Cauldron

Chapter 5: The Dementor

Chapter 6: Talons and Tea Leaves

Chapter 7: The Boggart in the Wardrobe

Chapter 8: Flight of the Fat Lady

Chapter 9: Grim Defeat

Chapter 10: The Marauders Map

Chapter 11: The Firebolt

Chapter 12: The Patronus

Chapter 13 : Gryffindor Versus Ravenclaw

Chapter 14: Snapes Grudge

Chapter 15: The Quidditch Final

Chapter 16: Professor Trelawneys Prediction

Chapter 17: Cat, Rat, and Dog

Chapter 18: Mooney, Wormtail, Padfoot, and Prongs

Chapter 19: The Servant of Lord Voldemort

Chapter 20: The Dementors Kiss

Chapter 21: Hermiones Secret

Chapter 22: Owl Post Again

Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire Book and Movie Differences

Chapter 1: The Riddle House

Chapter 2: The Scar

Chapter 3: The Invitation

Chapter 4: Back to the Barrow

Chapter 5: Weasleys Wizard Wheezes

Chapter 6: The Portkey

Chapter 7: Bagman and Crouch

Chapter 8: The Quidditch World Cup

Chapter 9: The Dark Mark

Chapter 10: Mayhem at the Ministry

Chapter 11: Aboard the Hogwarts Express

Chapter 12: The Triwizard Tournament

Chapter 13: Mad-Eye Moody

Chapter 14: Unforgivable Curses

Chapter 15: Beauxbatons and Durmstrang

Chapter 16: The Goblet of Fire

Chapter 17: The Four Champions

Chapter 18: The Weighing of the Wands

Chapter 19: The Hungarian Horntail

Chapter 20: The First Task

Chapter 21: The House-Elf Liberation Front

Chapter 22: The Unexpected Task

Chapter 23: The Yule Ball

Chapter 24: Rita Skeeters Scoop

Chapter 25: The Egg and the Eye

Chapter 26: The Second Task

Chapter 27: Padfoot Returns

Chapter 28: The Madness of Mr. Crouch

Chapter 29: The Dream

Chapter 30: The Pensieve

Chapter 31: The Third Task

Chapter 32: Flesh, Blood, Bone

Chapter 33: The Death Eaters

Chapter 34: Priori Incantatem

Chapter 35: Veritaserum

Chapter 36: The Parting of the Ways

Chapter 37: The Beginning

Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix Book and Movie Differences

Chapter 1: Dudley Demented

Chapter 2: A Peck of Owls

Chapter 3: The Advanced Guard

Chapter 4: Number Twelve, Grimmauld Place

Movie

Book

Harry is annoyed that he didnt hear anything from Ron and Hermione.

Harry is angry and shouts at Ron and Hermione since they got to go to Grimmauld Place while he was at the Dursleys.

Harry only snaps once at Dumbledore later on.

Harry snapping at his friends in anger becomes a recurring thing throughout the book.

The trio and Weasley twins use an Extendable Ear to eavesdrop on the Orders meeting.

They use an Imperturbable Charm to eavesdrop on the meeting.

Chapter 5: The Order of the Phoenix

Movie

Book

Kreacher is shown cleaning Siriuss mothers painting and calling her mistress.

There is a painting at Grimmauld place of Siriuss mother, which screams a lot.

Ginny is at the meeting. Mrs. Weasley argues with Sirius but quickly relents.

Mrs. Weasley doesnt allow Ginny to be a part of the meeting where everyone fills Harry in. She also argues with Sirius a lot longer about Harrys involvement.

Chapter 6: The Noble and Most Ancient House of Black

Movie

Book

This chapter is not included in the film.

Harry spends a few days at Grimmauld Place, helping clean the house and get it ready for the Order.

This happens later on, during Christmas.

Harry and Sirius look at the black family tree here.

Chapter 7: The Ministry of Magic

Movie

Book

Harry and Arthur never stop by his office and go straight to the hearing.

Harry and Arthur go to Arthur Weasleys office at the Ministry first.

Chapter 8: The Hearing

Movie

Book

Harry and Arthur didnt know the time of the hearing had been changed.

Harry and Arthur didnt know the hearing would take place in front of the entire Wizengamot.

Fudge calmly clears Harry of all charges.

Fudge can barely contain his anger as he clears Harry of all charges.

Chapter 9: The Woes of Mrs. Weasley

Movie

Book

None of this is present in the movie.

Ron and Hermione are Prefects and Harry is jealous Ron got the position over him. Rons parents get him a new broom as a reward.

Sirius gives Harry a photo of the Order at the train station.

Mrs. Weasley gives Harry the photo of the Order.

This isnt in the movie.

Harry witnesses Molly Weasley distraught after she tried to banish a boggart and it turned into dead members of her family.

Percys allegiance is only hinted at when he is with the group that catches Dumbledores Army later on.

It is mentioned that Percy favors the Ministry over his family and disowns them.

Chapter 10: Luna Lovegood

Movie

Book

The trio plus Neville meet Luna on a carriage on their way to Hogwarts.

Ginny introduces Harry to Luna on the train.

Only Harry and Luna can see the Thestrals.

Neville can see the Thestrals too.

Hermione has no idea what Harry is seeing.

Hermione knows what Thestrals are, despite not being able to see them.

Chapter 11: The Sorting Hats New Song

Movie

Book

As with every movie, the Sorting Hats song is not included.

The Sorting Hat has a new song.

Chapter 12: Professor Umbridge

Movie

Book

The movie jumps straight to Harrys first DADA class.

Harry has different classes before DADA.

Only the trio argue with Umbridge about not being able to learn defensive magic.

The trio, Dean Thomas, and Parvati Patil all argue against Umbridge.

Chapter 13: Detention with Dolores

Movie

Book

Harry gets detention for one day.

Harry gets detention for two weeks.

Hermione discovers the writing on Harrys hand and urges him to tell Dumbledore or McGonagall.

Ron discovers the writing on Harrys hand instead.

No other classes are included.

Harry and his friends go to other classes, like Care of Magical Creatures.

This isnt mentioned.

Hermione keeps trying to free the house-elves by leaving clothing in random places.

Ron doesnt join the Gryffindor Quidditch team until the sixth movie.

Ron joins the Gryffindor Quidditch team.

Chapter 14: Percy and Padfoot

Movie

Book

This doesnt happen.

Ron gets a letter from Percy that bad mouths Harry, Dumbledore, and Mrs. and Mrs. Weasley.

The trio and Sirius only talk about Hogwarts and the Order.

The trio talk to Sirius in the fireplace. The mention that Hagrid is missing, tell him how Hogwarts is running, and talk about visiting in person.

Chapter 15: The Hogwarts High Inquisitor

Movie

Book

McGonagall confronts Umbridge about her medieval ways of punishing students.

This doesnt happen.

Umbridge has a public event in the courtyard when she fires Trelawney.

There is no public event.

The movie skips this and jumps right into Harry agreeing.

Hermione and Ron both spend time trying to convince Harry to teach them DADA.

Chapter 16: In the Hogs Head

Movie

Book

The students ask some questions and express a few doubts in the meeting, but overall it goes smoothly.

More students doubt Harry and his claims, especially Zacharias Smith.

Chapter 17: Educational Decree Number Twenty-Four

Movie

Book

This doesnt happen.

Umbridge nearly catches the trio talking to Sirius.

This isnt included.

Hedwig is attacked, which leads them to believe someone is trying to intercept Harrys letters.

Chapter 18: Dumbledores Army

Movie

Book

Hermione never doubts the DA.

After Sirius agrees that the DA is a good idea, Hermione starts doubting it.

Neville finds the Room of Requirement.

Dobby shows them where the Room of Requirement is.

Ginnys relationship is not mentioned and she remains the same around Harry.

Ginny has a relationship with Micheal Corner and becomes more comfortable around Harry.

Padma Patil is portrayed as a Gryffindor student.

Padma Patil is a Ravenclaw student.

Hermione beats Ron in a duel.

Ron beats Hermione three times in their duel.

Chapter 19: The Lion and the Serpent

Movie

Book

No Quidditch is shown in the movie. Ron doesnt become Keeper until the next movie.

In this chapter, Ron becomes Keeper and the Slytherins taunt him all year. With Oliver Wood gone, Angelina Johnson becomes captain. Malfoy provokes Harry and the Weasley twins by insulting Mrs. Weasley. Harry and George attack him. Harry and the twins are banned from ever playing Quidditch again. Ginny becomes Seeker after Harry is banned.

Chapter 20: Hagrids Tale

Movie

Book

The trio visit Hagrid when he returns and talk during the day.

The trio sneak out at night with the Invisibility Cloak and overhear Umbridge and Hagrids conversation. She notices their footprints in the snow.

Hagrid briefly described that he was sent to parley with giants.

Hagrid described his and Madame Maximes journey to find and talk to the giants.

Luna tells Harry about Thestrals.

Hagrid teaches a class about Thestrals.

Chapter 21: The Eye of the Snake

Movie

Book

Harry dreams of Mr. Weasley being attacked. He snaps at Dumbledore for not acknowledging him and Snape takes him to his first Occlimacy lesson.

After having the dream, Harry and the others are sent to Grimmauld Place via Portkey.

Chapter 22: St. Mungos Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries

Movie

Book

The trio never go to the hospital and Mr. Weasley is returned to Grimmauld Place.

The Weasley family visit St. Mungos Hospital to see Mr. Weasley.

Chapter 23: Christmas on the Closed Ward

Movie

Book

This doesnt happen.

Harry is worried that he is a danger to those around him and considers leaving. He and Ginny discuss how she felt when she was possessed by Tom Riddle, which helps comfort Harry.

They never see Lockhart and Neville tells Harry about his parents in the Room of Requirement.

The trio see Lockhart at St. Mungos. Harry also runs into Neville there, who is visiting his parents. He tells Harry that they were tortured by Death Eaters.

Chapter 24: Occlumency

Movie

Book

This doesnt happen.

Snape stops by Grimmauld Place to tell Harry about his Occlumency lessons. He also tells Harry that Lucius Malfoy recognized Sirius at the train station.

The Knight Bus is not present in this film.

The trio take the Knight Bus to Hogsmeade to get back to Hogwarts.

Chapter 25: The Beetle at Bay

Movie

Book

Harry and Cho never go on a date.

Harry has a date with Cho. She is upset when he leaves to meet with Luna and Hermione.

Cho is in the same year as Harry.

Cho is a year above Harry.

Rita Skeeter is not in this movie.

Rita Skeeter interviews Harry for the Quibbler.

Chapter 26: Seen and Unforeseen

Movie

Book

There is no interview but the massive breakout is mentioned in the paper.

Rita Skeeters interview of Harry, plus the story of the massive breakout from Azkaban, helps to convince people that Harry and Dumbledores story is true.

No other visions are shown.

Harry has multiple visions, one of these including Augustus Rookwood telling Voldemort how to get into the Department of Mysteries.

No one replaces Trelawney.

Firenze, the Centaur, comes to Hogwarts to teach Divinations in Trelawneys place.

Chapter 27: The Centaur and the Sneak

Movie

Book

Neville is struggling to learn how to cast Expelliarmus.

Neville already knows how to cast Expelliarmus and wants Harry to teach him more complicated spells.

Umbridge blows a hole in the wall and all the DA members are caught.

Dobby gives the DA a heads up, so only Harry is caught. However, they learn who is a part of it based on the paper that Hermione made everyone sign.

Cho betrays the DA after she was given truth serum, causing Harry to break up with her before he knows the full truth.

Chos best friend, Marietta Edgecombe, betrays the DA. Harry breaks up with Cho when she defends Marietta.

This is not included.

The paper Hermione made everyone sign is jinxed. The word SNEAK appears across the forehead of the betrayer.

Dumbledore escapes without a fight.

Dumbledore has a small duel with Fudge and the Aurors before escaping.

The DA members serve detention in the Great Hall.

This is not in the book.

Chapter 28: Snapes Worst Memory

Movie

Book

Harry sees Snapes memories when he casts Protego.

Harry sees Snapes memories in a Pensieve.

Snapes memories consist of James Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, and Peter Pettigrew bullying him.

Snapes memories include him being bullied and his falling out with Lily.

Harry defends his father and his actions.

Harry cant justify his fathers actions and doesnt understand how his parents ended up together.

Chapter 29: Career Advice

Movie

Book

This isnt included.

In this chapter, students meet with their Head of House to discuss their careers after Hogwarts. Umbirdge attends Harry and McGonagalls meeting and claims Harry will never become an Auror. McGonagall stands up for him, claiming she will help Harry in any way.

This doesnt happen.

Harry breaks into Umbirdges office to use her fireplace to talk to Sirius and Lupin about his fathers actions. They reassure him.

Fred and George leave during the fifth years O.W.L.s, using fireworks to destroy the decrees and attack Umbridge and those that helped her.

Fred and George leave Hogwarts much earlier. They leave behind a swamp, stashes of their sweets that cause illnesses, and instructions for Peeves on how to wreak havoc.

Professor Flitwick is shown celebrating the Weasley twins destruction as they leave.

The Professors do nothing to remove the swamp, since they enjoy watching Umbridge and Filch struggle to do it.

Chapter 30: Grawp

Movie

Book

Hagrid takes Harry, Ron, and Hermione to meet Grawp. Grawp picks up Hermione and they spot Centaurs running by.

Ron is at a Quidditch match, so only Hermione and Harry meet Grawp. Grawp tries and fails to grab Hermione, and theyre confronted by Centaurs.

Chapter 31: O.W.L.s

Movie

Book

This scene is not included.

Umbridge and her Aurors attack Hagrid and Professor McGonagall protects him. However, this causes Hagrid to leave the school.

Harry sees a vision of Voldemort torturing Sirius while standing in the middle of the cheering crowd on the day the Weasley twins leave Hogwarts.

Harry falls asleep during one of his History of Magic O.W.L. and has a vision of Voldemort attacking Sirius.

Chapter 32: Out of the Fire

Movie

Book

The trio run to Umbridges office to use her Floo Network while she is distracted by the aftermath of the Weasley twins.

Neville, Luna, Ginny, Ron, and Hermione create a distraction so Harry can check and see if Sirius is at Grimmauld Place.

This doesnt happen.

Harry speaks with Kreacher, who lies to Harry and tells him that Sirius has gone to the Department of Mysteries and wont be coming back.

Its never revealed who sent the Dementors.

They learn that Umbridge is the one who sent the Dementors after Harry and Dudley.

Chapter 33: Fight and Flight

Movie

Book

Umbridge never says this.

Umbridge tells Harry and Hermione to go ahead of her because her life was more valuable.

Chapter 34: The Department of Mysteries

Movie

Book

No other rooms are shown in the movie.

The group finds rooms like the Brain Room and Time Room at the Department of Mysteries.

Others state that only Harry can touch the prophecy but dont explain why.

Someone named Broderick Bode tried to touch the prophecy, but suffered spell damage after touching it.

Chapter 35: Beyond the Veil

Movie

Book

The Death Eaters hold Harrys friends hostage.

Harrys friends are not held hostage, but still incapacitated in some way. Bellatrix uses the Cruciatus Curse on Neville.

The archway is a transparent mist.

The archway has a black veil.

Lucius drops the prophecy after Sirius punches him, causing it to shatter.

The prophecy breaks after it falls out of Nevilles pocket when he tries to escape.

Bellatrix kills Sirius with the killing curse.

Bellatrix shoved Sirius into the veil.

Chapter 36: The Only One He Ever Feared

Movie

Book

During the battle, Dumbledore traps Voldemort in a ball of water.

During the battle between Voldemort and Dumbledore, Dumbledore creates a fiery rope, transfigures statues, and Fawks aides him.

Voldemort possesses Harry to taunt Dumbledore.

Voldemort possesses Harry and tries to convince Dumbledore to kill him by sacrificing Harry.

This is not shown.

Dumbledore sends Harry back to his office at Hogwarts with a Portkey.

Chapter 37: The Lost Prophecy

Movie

Book

Harry doesnt do this.

Harry is very upset after Siriuss death and destroys Dumbledores office.

Harry hears the prophecy when he touches the orb.

Harry never got the chance to hear the prophecy and Dumbeldore shows him through a memory in the Pensieve.

Chapter 38: The Second War Begins

Movie Book

Dumbledore being reinstated, Umbirdge being suspended, and Fudge retiring is shown through Daily Prophet clips.

Harry has a few more days at Hogwarts to cope. News arrives that the Dementors have sided with Voldemort. Umbridge is chased away from Hogwarts by Peeves, who whacks her on the head with a walking stick, which was given to him by Professor McGonagall. Harry talks to Nearly Headless Nick and asks if Sirius can come back as a ghost.

The movie ends on a bright note with Harry walking to the train with his friends.

The book ends with Harry back at the Dursleys. Moody, Lupin, and Tonks threaten the Dursleys so they dont mistreat Harry.

Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince Book and Movie Differences

Chapter 1: The Other Minister

Movie

Book

The Death Eaters are shown attacking Diagon Alley and kidnapping Ollivander.

The attack and kidnapping are only mentioned.

The Millennium Bridge is destroyed but all Muggles escape.

The Brockdale Bridge is destroyed by Death Eaters and 50 Muggles are killed.

This is not shown.

A scene from Fudges POV shows him talking with the Muggle Prime Minister and others about Voldemorts return.

In the beginning, Harry is at a diner reading the Daily Prophet when a Muggle waitress flirts with him.

This scene does not appear in the book.

Chapter 2: Spinners End

Movie

Book

Peter Pettigrew answers the door and leads Bellatrix and her sister to Snape. Snape slams the door in his face.

Snape answers the door and leads Bellatrix and her sister to the parlor. Pettigrew brings them drinks and then eavesdrops on them.

When Bellatrix and Narcissa visit Snape, Belltrix shows that she strongly dislikes Snape and is the one to suggest the Unbreakable Vow. Snape is hesitant to agree.

When Bellatrix and Narcissa visit Snape, Bellatrix is less hateful. Narcissa suggests the Unbreakable Vow and Snape agrees to it.

Chapter 3: Will and Wont

Movie

Book

Harry is at a train station when Dumbledore surprises him and takes him to meet Slughorn.

Dumbledore meets Harry at Privet Drive, where he has tea with the Dursleys, before he takes him to meet Slughorn.

These things are not mentioned.

Harry inherits Grimmauld Place and Kreacher. Hagrid also gets Buckbeak back. The Ministry issues safety measures.

Chapter 4: Horace Slughorn

Movie

Book

Dumbledores hand doesnt show signs of causing him pain and he shows Harry before he can ask.

There are signs that Dumbledores hand is bothering him. When Harry notices, he asks about it.

The giveaway that Slughorn is in the house is Dragons Blood.

The flaw in Slughorns plan is that he forgot to cast the Dark Mark.

Dumbledore alone restores the house. Harry and Slughorn talk while Dumbeldore is in the bathroom and they leave the moment Dumbledore gets out.

Dumbledore and Slughorn restore the house before they all have drinks together. Dumbledore then goes to the bathroom before declaring Slughorn a lost cause.

Dumbledore Apparates Harry to the Burrow and he appears in a swamp, alone.

Dumbledore Apparates Harry to the Burrow and they talk about the prophecy, private lessons, Siriuss death, and more.

Chapter 5: An Excess of Phlegm

Movie

Book

Harry arrives alone at the Burrow and Ginny sees Hedwig. She is the first to find him, then Hermione and Ron. Mrs. Weasley had no idea Dumbledore would be dropping him off and Tonks is not there.

When Harry arrives at the Burrow, Mrs. Weasley and Tonks greet him and Dumbledore. Ron and Hermione dont see him until the next morning. Mrs. Weasley was expecting him because Dumbledore informed her.

Harry hangs out with Ron and Hermione once he arrives.

After arriving, Harry has soup with Mrs. Weasley and they discuss Mr. Wealseys promotion and Slughorn. Mr. Weasley comes home and joins them for soup.

Bill and Fleurs wedding isnt mentioned until the next movie. Tonks and Lupins relationship is only hinted at later in this movie.

Fleur is also at the Burrow while Harry is staying there. There is talk of her and Bills wedding. Tonks talks to Mrs. Weasley about her feelings for Lupin.

Ron and Hermione already know about the prophecy.

Harry shares the prophecy with Ron and Hermione.

This is not included in the film.

Hermione ends up getting punched by a boxing telescope Fred and George left in their room.

McGonagall mentions in the crowded corridor that Harry exceeded expectations in Potions.

Owls bring their test results from their O.W.L.s. Harry exceeded expectations in Potions.

Chapter 6: Dracos Detour

Movie

Book

The movie doesnt mention how Fred and George were able to open their joke shop.

Fred and George used the tournament winnings that Harry gave them to open their shop.

This is not mentioned.

Igor Karkaroff is murdered.

The trio only see Draco and his mother going to Borgin and Burkes.

The trio run into the Malfoys at Madam Malkins and get into a fight.

The trio watch from a rooftop and Draco looks at a cabinet in Borgin and Burkes.

Harry, Ron, and Hermione follow Draco under the Invisibility Cloak and use an Extendable Ear to eavesdrop on his and Mr. Borgins conversation. Draco is trying to learn how to fix a cabinet. Hermione tries to trick Mr. Borgin into telling her more about their conversation.

Chapter 7: The Slug Club

Movie

Book

The next scene jumps to the Hogwarts Express.

The trio go back to the Burrow.

Harry shares a compartment with Ron and Hermione. Luna sells issues of The Quibbler in the hallway to Ginny and Dean.

Since Ron and Hermione are Prefects, Harry shares a compartment with Luna and Neville. He tries to share one with Ginny, but she leaves to see Dean.

Slughorns first Slug Club meeting is in his office at Hogwarts.

Slughorn has his first Slug Club meeting in a compartment on the train.

Harry uses Peruvian Instant Darkness Powder that he got from Fred and Georges joke shop to get into the Slytherin compartment.

Harry follows Blaise Zabini into the Slytherins compartment while under the Invisibility Cloak.

Chapter 8: Snape Victorious

Movie

Book

Luna finds Harry on the train with her Spectrespecs.

Tonks finds Harry on the train. She tells him she didnt see him leave and, knowing he has his cloak, decided to double check.

Professor Flitwick greets Harry and Luna at the gate and Luna uses Episkey to fix Harrys broken nose.

Snape greets Harry at the gate and takes him to the castle. Snape sees Tonks patronus has changed, because of her love for Lupin, and he tells her she is making a mistake.

Harry is already in his robes when he reaches the Great Hall. Since Luna already healed his nose, Ginny gives him a handkerchief.

Harry arrives in the Great Hall in his normal clothes and Hermione uses the Tergeo spell to heal it.

No one reacts to Dumbledores hand and there is no scene where Hagrid is late. Harry isnt angry about Snapes appointment and no DADA classes are shown.

Students react when they see Dumbledores injured hand and he dismisses it. Hagrid is late from being in the forest with Grawp. Harry is furious when he hears about Snapes appointment as DADA teacher.

Chapter 9: The Half-Blood Prince

Movie

Book

Harry and Ron fight over the new Advanced Potion-Making book and Harry loses, getting the old one.

Slughorn hands both Harry and Ron old copies of Advanced Potion-Making.

The Felix Felicis is clear and Slughorn doesnt mention how long the effects last.

The Felix Felicis is gold and Slughorn says its effects last for 12 hours.

Chapter 10:The House of Gaunt

Movie

Book

There is no mention of the Gaunt family in the memories, only a young Tom Riddle.

Dumbledore shows Harry the memory of the Gaunt family, including Merope Gaunt, Voldemorts mother.

Dumbledore says the ring belonged to Voldemorts mother. There is no mention of the Peverell family or the Resurrection Stone.

The ring that injured Dumbledores hand is an heirloom of the Peverell family that belonged to Voldemorts uncle. The Resurrection Stone sits in the middle, but its cracked.

Chapter 11: Hermiones Helping Hand

Movie

Book

Hagrid is seen in the background and there is no mention of Aragog until his funeral.

Hagrid is noticeably absent and doesnt acknowledge the trio much when hes around. They finally visit him, where he tells them Aragog is dying.

Chapter 12: Silver and Opals

Movie

Book

Harry runs into Slughorn at The Three Broomsticks. He invites Harry and Hermione to his first dinner party, and Harry gladly accepts. He calls Ron Wallenby.

Harry runs into Slughorn at Honeydukes, where he invites Harry to the dinner parties he has been missing. Harry tells him he has a meeting with Dumbledore. Slughorn calls Ron Ralph.

This doesnt happen.

Harry meets Tonks and Mundungus Fletcher at Hogsmeade.

When asked why Harry suspects Draco cursed Katie, he says he just knows.

When asked why Harry suspects Draco cursed Katie, he tells McGonagall about following him to Borgin and Burkes.

Chapter 13: The Secret Riddle

Movie

Book

Dumbledore and Mrs. Cole walk up the steps of the orphanage and she only mentions that there have been incidents with Tom and the other kids.

During the memory, Dumbledore has drinks with Mrs. Cole. It is mentioned that Tom hurts other kids in a cave. Tom asks Dumbeldore if his father is a wizard.

Chapter 14: Felix Felicis

Movie

Book

Luna is the one who notices Harry put something in Rons drink.

Hermione notices Harry pretending to put Felix Felicis into Rons drink.

During the match, only Ron is shown. The scene cuts to the party before showing the end of the match.

During the match, the book describes Ron saving goals, Ginny scoring a goal, and Harry catching the snitch. Malfoy is also playing on the Slytherin team.

This doesnt happen in the movie.

Before Ron starts dating Lavender, Ron and Ginny get into a fight. She brings up the possibility of Hermione kissing Krum and points out that hes never been asked out before.

Chapter 15: The Unbreakable Vow

Movie

Book

Harry invites Hermione to Slughorns party, but she is already going with McLaggen. Harry proceeds to ask Luna.

Harry asks Luna to Slughorns party.

Harry hides around a corner and listens to Draco and Snapes brief conversation about the Unbreakable Vow.

Harry hides under his Invisibility Cloak and hears a much longer conversation between Snape and Draco.

Chapter 16: A Very Frosty Christmas

Movie

Book

The Burrow is attacked by Death Eaters during Christmas break.

This does not happen.

Lupin doesnt mention this.

Lupin reveals that Snape made him a Wolfsbane Potion every month while he taught at Hogwarts. He tells Harry that he was turned by Fenrir Greyback and that he has been given a job trying to convince werewolves to join them.

This doesnt happen.

Percy and Rufus Scrimgeour show up. Scrimgeour attempts to persuade Harry to help the Ministry and tell everyone that the Ministry is doing a good job. Harry sides with Dumbledore over the Ministry.

Chapter 17: A Sluggish Memory

Movie

Book

These memories are not included.

There are more memories of Voldemort killing the Riddle family, stealing the ring, him working at Borgin and Burkes, and more. Each memory hints to a Horcrux.

In Slughorns false memory, the word Horcrux is muffled.

In Slughorns false memory, he says the word Horcrux. However, Dumbeldore wishes to learn exactly what Slughorn told Voldemort about Horcruxes.

Chapter 18: Birthday Surprises

Movie

Book

There are no Apparition lessons and the trio just know how to do it in the next film.

Apparition lessons are taught by Wilkie Twycross.

Ron ingests the love potion and drinks the poisoned meade on Valentines Day.

Ron ingests the love potion and drinks the poisoned meade on his birthday.

Chapter 19: Elf Tails

Movie

Book

This match is not included.

There is another Quidditch match with Luna commentating. McLaggen knocks Harry off his broom with a Bludger and he ends up in the Hospital Wing.

This doesnt happen.

Harry has Dobby and Kreatcher track Draco for him.

A few professors, Dumbledore, Harry, and Hermione are visiting Ron in the Hospital Wing. Dumbledore praises Harry for using a bezoar.

Hagrid, Mr. and Mrs. Weasley, Fred, and George also visit Ron in the Hospital. Fred praises Harry for using a bezoar. Hagird tells Harry about an argument between Snape and Dumbledore that he overheard.

Chapter 20: Lord Voldemorts Request

Movie

Book

This memory is not included.

There is a memory of a house-elf named Hokey and Hepzibah Smith. They helped Voldemort find Slytherins Locket and Hufflepuffs Cup.

Dumbledore does not mention this.

Dumbledore mentions that the DADA teaching position was possibly jinxed by Voldemort when Dumbledore refused to hire him.

Chapter 21: The Unknowable Room

Movie

Book

Draco is shown going to the Room of Requirement and testing the vanishing cabinet on multiple occasions.

These scenes are not shown in the book. Harry notices Draco vanishing from the Marauder's Map when he goes into the Room of Requirement.

Chapter 22: After the Burial

Movie

Book

Harry goes to Hagrids Hut and finds him mourning Aragog.

Hagrid sends a letter to the trio about Aragogs death.

Harry drinks the entire luck potion and doesnt use his cloak. He runs into Slughorn stealing tentacula leaves.

Harry uses a few drops of Felix Felicis and uses his Invisibility Cloak. He bumps into Ginny, which leads to an argument between her and Dean where they break up. Harry runs into Slughorn working with Professor Sprout.

Slughorn talks about a present Harrys mother left him. They briefly talk about his parents deaths.

Hagrid mentions Harrys parents before falling asleep. This leads to Harry and Slughorn talking in depth about them.

Chapter 23: Horcruxes

Movie

Book

Only the ring and Tom Riddles diary are mentioned as Horcruxes. Dumbeldore says they could be anything.

Dumbledore and Harry know that the locket and the cup are potential Horcruxes. They discuss other items important to the founders and Nagini also being Horcruxes.

Chapter 24: Sectumsempra

Movie

Book

Harry questions Katie and then chases Draco to the boys bathroom. They get into a duel, casting multiple spells, before Harry casts Sectumsempra.

Harry follows Draco on the map days after questioning Katie. He finds him crying and Moaning Myrtle is there. Draco attempts to use Crucio on Harry, who immediately casts Sectumsempra. Myrtle starts screaming Murder, which alerts Snape.

Harry runs away while Snape heals Draco.

Harry stays in the bathroom. Snape takes Draco to the Hospital Wing. When he returns, he uses Legilimency on Harry to figure out how Harry learned the spell. He then demands that Harry bring all his books to him. Harry does so, but brings Rons copy of Advanced Potion-Making instead of his own.

Harry is not punished.

Harry is given detention every Saturday for the rest of the year and he has to miss the Gryffindor-Ravenclaw match.

Both Hermione and Ginny convince Harry to get rid of the book for good. Ginny and Harry go to the Room of Requirement, where Ginny hides the book before they kiss.

Ginny defends Harry when Hermione tells him to get rid of the book. They take it to the Room of Requirement and Harry plans to come back for it.

Ginny kisses Harry after the Ravenclaw-Gryffindor Quidditch match.

Chapter 25: The Seer Overheard

Movie

Book

This doesnt happen because Harry used it all.

Harry gives Ron and Hermione the last of the Felix Felicis.

Harry overhears the end of an argument between Snape and Dumbledore. They Disapparate from the Astronomy Tower.

Harry, using the Invisibility Cloak, follows Dumbledore to Hogs Head Inn, where they Disapparate.

Chapter 26: The Cave

Movie

Book

The movie doesnt show how they got from the rock to the cave.

Harry and Dumbledore have to swim from the rock to the cave entrance.

Dumbledore knows how to get into the hideout and that the potion needs to be drunk.

Dumbledore takes time to ponder how to access the hideout and that someone will have to drink the potion.

The basin is filled with black liquid. They use the shell next to it to drink the potion. Dumbledore starts reacting after the first cup. He stays conscious. When Harry tries to get him water, the shell wont pick any up.

The basin is filled with a green potion. Dumbledore summons a cup and starts reacting after the third drink. He falls unconscious. Harry tries to fill the cup with water, but it's empty before he can reach Dumbledore.

Chapter 27: The Lightning Struck Tower

Movie

Book

Harry and Dumbledore Apparte to the Astronomy Tower. No Dark Mark has been cast yet.

Dumbledore and Harry Apparate to Hogsmeade, where Madam Rosmerta tells them the Dark Mark has been cast. They use her broomsticks to get to the Astronomy Tower.

Dumbledore tells Harry to hide below. He hesitates but obeys. Snape sees him and tells him to keep silent. Harry listens to him.

Dumbledore uses a spell to freeze Harry to keep him from interfering and no one sees him.

Bellatrix tries to persuade Draco to kill Dumbledore.

Bellatrix is not present.

Chapter 28: Flight of the Prince

Movie

Book

Snape simply states that he is the Half-Blood Prince.

It is explained that Snape is the Half-Blood Prince, because he is a Half-Blood and his mothers maiden name is Prince.

Death Eaters rampage through Hogwarts, destroying the Great Hall and catching Hagrids Hut on fire. They cast the Dark Mark in the sky.

There is a small battle between Aurors, students, and Death Eaters. Bill Weasley is bitten by Fenrir Greyback.

Harry tries to use Sectumsempra on Snape.

Harry tries to use the Cruciatus Curse on Snape.

Chapter 29: The Phoenix Lament

Movie

Book

There is no mention of Fang being inside the hut, although Hagrid is shown with Harry in the courtyard in the next scene.

Fang is trapped inside Hagrids burning hut. Harry and Hagrid use Aguamenti Charms to put out the fire.

The fake locket looks exactly like the real locket and Harry doesnt open it until later.

Harry opens the locket, which he notices is different, next to Dumbledores body.

This is not included.

On the way to the Hospital Wing, Harry sees Bill is injured and Fleur declares she still wants to marry him.

Chapter 30: The White Tomb

Movie Book

These scenes are not included. The movie ends with the trio watching Fawkes fly away.

There is a funeral for Dumbledore. Hermione tells Harry that Ron doesnt mind him and Ginny being together. Harry and Ginny break up because he wants to keep her safe.

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1 Book and Movie Differences

Chapter 1: The Dark Lord Ascending

Movie

Book

Snape arrives at the Malfoy Manor alone.

Snape arrives at the Malfoy Manor with Corban Yaxley.

Chapter 2: In Memoriam

Movie

Book

Hermione is shown erasing her parents memories.

This is not shown. Hermione later tells Harry and Ron what she did.

Chapter 3: The Dursleys Departing

Movie

Book

The Dursleys leave their home at Privet Drive. Harry watches them leave without a word.

Two members of the order take the Dursleys to safety. Dudley thanks Harry for saving his life before they leave.

Chapter 4: The Seven Potters

Movie

Book

They all head to the Burrow.

They all head to separate areas and use a Portkey to get to the Burrow.

Harry meets Bill Weasley for the first time.

Harry and Bill have already met.

This is not mentioned,

Mundungus Fletcher says he came up with the idea. It is later revealed in Snapes memories that Snape and the portrait of Dumbledore came up with the idea and gave it to Mundungus.

Hedwig is set free.

Hedwig is still locked in her cage.

Chapter 5: Fallen Warrior

Movie

Book

The Death Eaters realize who the real Harry is when Hedwig sacrifices herself.

The Death Eaters realize who the real Harry is when he casts Expelliarmus.

Hagrid uses a speed boost to try and outrun the Death Eaters. They end up on the street with Muggle drivers.

The sidecar falls off mid-flight and Harry has to sit behind Hagrid. They never send up on the road.

They go straight to the Burrow and Harry doesnt lose consciousness.

Harry loses consciousness and wakes up at the Tonks house, where he meets Ted and Andromeda Tonks. He accuses Andromeda of being Bellatrix, not knowing they are sisters.

There is little reaction to Moodys death.

Moodys death impacts everyone greatly and they take shots of Firewhisky.

Harry tries to sneak out and is caught by Ron.

Harry only thinks about sneaking out.

Chapter 6: The Ghoul in Pyjamas

Movie

Book

This chapter does not appear in the film.

The Weasleys plan to use a ghoul to hide the fact that Ron is helping Harry.

Chapter 7: The Will of Albus Dumbledore

Movie

Book

George walks in on Harry and Ginny kissing in the kitchen.

Ron walks in on Harry and Ginny kissing in her bedroom. Harry and Ron get into an argument.

Scrimgeour hands over the items from Dumbledores will with no issue. There are no arguments.

Scrimgeour states that the Ministry didnt want them to have the items Dumbledore left to them. Hermione and Scrimgeour get into an argument. He is angry that they are not sharing what they are doing for Dumbledore. Harry argues with Scrimgeour when he states that the Sword of Gryffindor is not Dumbledores to give away.

Harry doesnt remember until later that he caught his first Snitch with his mouth.

Harry immediately touches the Snitch to his mouth to see the message Dumbledore left.

Chapter 8: The Wedding

Movie

Book

Harry goes to the wedding as himself.

Harry pretends to be Rons cousin, Barny Weasley.

This doesnt happen.

Lupin asks Harry to be the godfather of his and Tonks son, Teddy.

Chapter 9: A Place to Hide

Movie

Book

It is not mentioned how the Death Eaters found the trio at the cafe.

A taboo was put on Voldemorts name and this is how the trio was found.

Ron finds Regulus Blacks room and they connect him to R.A.B. right after.

Harry finds the room. He gives Kreacher the fake locket to convince him to give them answers. Kreacher tells them Reguluss backstory.

Chapter 10: Kreachers Tale

Movie

Book

This never happens in the movie.

Harry learns that Kreacher was not treated well by Sirius. When Harry gives Kreacher the fake locket, the house-elf takes a liking to the trio and even cooks meals for them.

Chapter 11: The Bribe

Movie

Book

This isnt shown.

Lupin finds the trio at Grimmauld Place and tries to convince Harry to let him join. Harry realizes Lupin is running from Tonks and their unborn son. He is angry with Lupin.

Chapter 12: Magic is Might

Movie

Book

This is skipped.

The trio spends weeks planning on how to get into the Ministry.

Harry never runs into Percy or Arthur.

While pretending to be Albert Runcorn, Harry runs into Percy and Arthur. Harry warns Arthur that he is being tracked.

Chapter 13: The Muggle-Born Registration Commission

Movie

Book

This is not shown.

Umbridge has Moodys eye on her office door and he takes it. Harry is also nearly caught while inside her office.

Harry walks into the interrogation in plain sight. Ron is also there.

Harry uses the Invisibility Cloak to sneak into Mary Cattermoles interrogation.

Mrs. Cattermole is the only Muggle-born they run into. She does not escape with them.

Harry, Ron, and Hermione help Mrs. Cattermole and other Muggle-borns escape the Ministry.

Chapter 14: The Thief

Movie

Book

Rons arm is splinched and it looks like a giant cut.

Rons injury is more severe. A lot of his arm is missing.

The trio takes turns trying to destroy the locket.

The trio already know that no ordinary spell will destroy the locket. They know they need the Sword of Gryffindor or something similar.

Chapter 15: The Goblins Revenge

Movie

Book

This is never mentioned.

The trio learn that Luna, Ginny, and Neville tried to steal the Sword of Gryffindor and it was relocated to Bellatrixs vault.

The trio never run into these characters. Instead, Snatchers nearly catch them.

The trio nearly run into Dean Thomas, Griphook, Ted Tonks, Dirk Cresswell, and Gornuk while on the run.

Ron listens to the radio everyday for news.

Ron doesnt have the radio until he returns. They also dont know about Snatchers until this point.

Chapter 16: Godrics Hollow

Movie

Book

After Ron leaves, Hermione is noticeably down. Harry dances with her to try and cheer her up.

Harry and Hermione barely talk after Ron leaves. Harry spends most of his time watching Ginny and his friends on the Marauders Map.

Harry and Hermione go to Godrics Hollow as themselves. Hermione mentions that they should have used Polyjuice Potion but Harry wanted to return as himself.

Harry and Hermione use Polyjuice Potion, disguising themselves as middle-aged Muggles.

Hermione finds Ignotus Perverells grave and Harry finds his parents grave.

Hermione finds multiple graves, including one for the Dumbledores.

Chapter 17: Bathildas Secret

Movie

Book

The film has Harry and Bathilda speaking Parseltongue.

The book doesnt reveal that Harry was speaking Parseltongue the entire time until Nagini reveals herself.

Harry and Hermione Disapperate, breaking the windows as they go.

Harry and Hermione are nearly caught by Voldemort. Harry sees a vision, from Voldemorts perspective, where they are nearly caught.

Chapter 18: The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore

Movie

Book

Hermione is shown reading The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore and she shows Harry a photo of Gellert Grindelwald.

Harry reads the Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore, learning a great deal about Dumbledores backstory and his friendship with Grindelwald.

Chapter 19: The Silver Doe

Movie

Book

Ron mentions that he had to hide from Snatchers.

Ron goes into detail about his time living with Bill and Fleur. He avoided Death Eaters by pretending to be Stan Shunpike.

When Hermione sees Ron, she snatches his bag from him, throws leaves at him, and hits him with his own bag.

Harry cast Protego between Ron and Hermione so Hermione cant attack Ron.

Chapter 20: Xenophilius Lovegood

Movie

Book

This is not included.

In the book, Ginny has returned home because its too dangerous at Hogwarts. When the trio visit the Lovegoods home, they are close to the Weasleys and Harry longs to see her.

Chapter 21: The Tale of the Three Brothers

Movie

Book

There is no argument and its only implied that Harrys cloak is the same one from the tale.

Hermione and Mr. Lovegood argue over the validity of the tale. Hermione believes its just a myth. Ron openly admits that he thinks Harrys Invisibility Cloak could be the same one from the story.

Chapter 22: The Deathly Hallows

Movie

Book

The trio is captured in the woods right after escaping the Lovegood home.

The trio escape the Death Eaters that attack Mr. Lovegoods home. They have time to discuss the Deathly Hallows, each picking which they believe is the best. They are later caught in their tent.

Chapter 23: Malfoy Manor

Movie Book

Dean Thomas is not present. Harry and Ron find Griphook with Luna and Ollivander later.

The Snatchers also have Dean Thomas.

Dobby stuns Wormtail from behind, knocking him out.

Wormtail tries to strangle Harry, but Harry reminds him that he owes him a life debt. When Wormtail hesitates, his silver hand turns on him and he unwillingly strangles himself.

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 Book and Movie Differences

Chapter 24: The Wandmaker

Movie

Book

Harry digs Dobbys grave alone.

Dean helps Harry dig Dobbys grave.

Chapter 25: Shell Cottage

Movie

Book

Griphook demands the sword of Gryffindor as payment for helping the trio get into Gringotts.

It is explained that Goblins view ownership differently. They see purchased items as rented or borrowed, and the real ownership still belongs to the maker. Since the Sword of Gryffindor is Goblin made, the Goblins believe it still belongs to them.

The trio stay at the Cottage for a short amount of time before going to Gringotts.

The trio stay at the Cottage for a longer period of time. Lupin even stops by and they talk about this newly born son, Teddy. They named him after Ted Tonks, who was killed.

Chapter 26: Gringotts

Movie

Book

These scenes dont happen.

When Hermione is disguised as Bellatrix, a man attacks her, demanding to know what Voldemort did to his kids. Ron has to stun the man to protect Hermione.

Travers, a Death Eater, spots them and joins them. Harry has to use the Imperius Curse to control him.

Hermione, disguised as Bellatrix, refuses to present her wand when asked. They notice the Goblins acting weird.

When asked for Bellatrixs wand, a disguised Hermione presents her wand. The Goblins act suspicious and the trio realize they must know Bellatrixs wand was stolen.

Harry can sense the Horcruxes. Both Voldemort and Harry can feel when they are destroyed.

Voldemort and Harry cannot feel when the lockets are destroyed. Voldemort realizes Harry is after the Horcruxes after they break into Gringotts.

Chapter 27: The Final Hiding Place

Movie

Book

Harry sees Voldemort Disapparating with Nagini to keep her safe in a vision. He then sees images of Hogwarts and realizes that is where the final Horcrux resides.

Harry regularly uses his connection with Voldemort to keep track of him. He knows the last place he will go is Hogwarts.

Chapter 28: The Missing Mirror

Movie

Book

When the trio Apparate into Hogsmeade, this sets off an alarm that has Death Eaters looking for them. Aberforth Dumbledore helps get them off the street.

When the trio Apparate into Hogsmeade, they use the Invisibility Cloak to hide. Death Eaters try to use a spell to summon them, but it doesnt work because the cloak is resistant to spells. Death Eaters unleash a Dementor, which corners the trio and Harry has to use his Patronus. The Death Eaters spot a stag, but Aberfoth intercepts them and shows them his goat Patronus, claiming they mistook his Patronus for a stag.

Aberforth alludes to a bad past with Dumbledore but doesnt go into detail.

Aberfoth tells the trio the story of what happened to the Dumbledore family and their sister, Ariana.

Chapter 29: The Lost Diadem

Movie

Book

They never talk about who was leading Dumbledores Army.

Ginny, Neville, and Luna lead Dumbledores Army during that year.

Ginny was at Hogwarts the entire time.

Ginny didnt return to Hogwarts until after Easter because it was too dangerous.

Dean and Cho are at Hogwarts when Harry arrives.

Dean was on the run and Cho had already graduated. However, they do arrive later.

Ron and Hermione tell Harry they are going to the Chamber of Secrets.

Harry doesnt learn Ron and Hermione went to the Chamber of Secrets until after the fact.

Harry goes to Ravenclaw Tower and Luna has to chase after him, calling his name and demanding he stop and listen to her.

Harry and Luna go to the Ravenclaw Common Room together.

Chapter 30: The Sacking of Severus Snape

Movie

Book

McGonagall and Snape have a one on one duel in the Great Hall.

McGonagall, Slughorn, Flitwick, and Sprout all fight Snape in a corridor.

McGonagall asks Filch to take the Slytherin students to the dungeon. All remaining students fight.

All the teachers try to send the underage students somewhere away from the battle so theyd be safe.

Percy is shown in the background.

Percy, who had betrayed his family for the Ministry, finally rejoins them and fights on their side.

Chapter 31: The Battle of Hogwarts

Movie

Book

Luna tells Harry where to find Helena Ravenclaw.

Nearly Headless Nick tells Harry where to find Helena Ravenclaw.

Ginny hid the Half-Blood Princes book somewhere in the Room of Requirement in the last movie and its not mentioned again. Harry relies on his ability to sense the Horcruxes to find the diadem.

Harry unknowingly hid the Half-Blood Princes book in the Room of Requirement, next to the diadem. This is how he knows how to find the diadem so easily.

Draco, Goyle, and Blaise Zabini try to stop the trio. Goyle starts the fire and dies.

Draco, Crabbe, and Goyle try to stop the trio, Crabbe starts a fire and ends up dying.

Harry stabs the diadem with a Basilisk fang, destroying it.

The diadem is destroyed in the fire.

Harry, Ron, and Hermione discover Fred has died when they find all the bodies gathered in the Great Hall.

Harry, Ron, and Hermione are with Fred and Percy when Fred is killed.

Chapter 32: The Elder Wand

Movie

Book

Harry sees Voldemort at the Boathouse in a vision. They realize Nagini is the next Horcrux.

Voldemort is in the Shrieking Shack when the trio decide to go after Nagini.

Aberforth uses a Patronus Charm to ward off the Dementors.

Seamus, Ernie, and Luna save the trio from Dementors.

Voldemort uses a non-verbal spell to injure Snape before sicking Nagini on him.

Voldemort tells Nagini to kill Snape.

Chapter 33: The Princes Tale

Movie

Book

Harry doesnt have much of a reaction when he sees that Lupin and Tonks are among the dead.

When Harry sees that Lupin and Tonks are dead, its like a punch to the gut. He feels overwhelming guilt for their deaths, as well as Freds.

Petunia is only shown in Snapes memories for a second.

Snape witnesses Petunias jealousy and hatred.

The movie doesnt explain why Snape and Lilys friendship fell apart.

Snape and Lilys friendship fell apart because he was friends with Death Eaters and called her a mudblood.

Snape finds Lilys body in Harrys bedroom and holds her.

Snape only learns about Lilys death and cries in Dumbledores office.

Its not explained exactly how George lost his ear.

A memory of Snape accidentally hitting George with the Sectumsempra spell is shown. Snape had been trying to save Lupin from a Death Eater, but he missed the Death Eaters wand.

The memory ends before showing Snapes time as headmaster.

There are more memories that show Snape as headmaster. During his time, he is still helping the Order.

Chapter 34: The Forest Again

Movie

Book

Harry says goodbye to Ron and Hermione.

Harry doesnt say goodbye. He uses the Invisibility Cloak to sneak out and runs into Neville along the way. He tells him to kill Nagini if he gets the chance. Harry sees Ginny on his way out and has a hard time walking away.

After using the Resurrection Stone and talking to his loved ones, Harry drops the stone and continues on to face Voldemort.

Harry keeps the stone in his hand and his loved ones walk with him to face death. He drops the stone when he faces Voldemort.

Chapter 35: Kings Cross

Movie

Book

Harry wakes up in Kings Cross, fully clothed.

Harry is naked when he wakes in Kings Cross. When he wishes for a robe, a robe appears out of thin air.

This is not discussed.

Dumbledore explains that Harry is alive because Voldemort used his blood to rebuild his body. Harrys blood, and his mothers protection spell, live inside Voldemort, tethering Harry to life.

They dont talk about this.

Harry and Dumbledore discuss the Hallows and Dumbledores past with Grindelwald.

In the first part, Grindelwald revealed that the Elder Wand is in Dumbledores grave.

It is mentioned in this chapter that Grindelwald refused to tell Voldemort anything about the Elder wand.

They dont discuss the Resurrection Stone.

Dumbledore reveals that he tried to use the Resurrection Stone when he found it. He thought about bringing back his parents and sister.

Chapter 36: The Flaw in the Plan

Movie

Book

Neville finds the Sorting Hat in the rubble and sees the sword inside. Neville kills Nagini while she is attacking Ron and Hermione.

To humiliate Neville, Voldemort puts the Sorting Hat on his head, binds him, and catches the hat on fire. When Neville breaks free, he pulls the sword from the hat and kills Nagini, who is around Voldemorts neck.

Voldemort is not present when Molly Weasley kills Bellatrix.

Voldemort is outraged by Bellatrixs death and attacks Mrs. Weasley. Harry, who was hiding under the Invisibility Cloak, uses a spell to shield her and reveals that hes alive.

Harry and Voldemort have a final duel in the courtyard, alone.

Harry and Voldemort have their final standoff surrounded by hundreds of people. Harry reveals that Snape was loyal to Dumbledore, Dumbledore planned his own death, and how the Elder Wand ended up belonging to Harry.

Voldemort disintegrates like paper when he dies.

Voldemort dies a very normal death after his Killing Curse rebounds on him.

Harry, Ron, and Hermione go to the bridge after the battle.

Harry cant escape the celebration. Luna promises to distract everyone so he can use his cloak. He, Ron, and Hermione go to the headmaster's office and talk to Dumledores portrait.

Harry breaks the Elder Wand in half and throws it off the bridge.

Harry uses the Elder Wand to repair his own wand. He plans to return the wand to Dumbledores grave. This ensures that, should Harry die a natural death, the power of the wand will also die with him.

Epilogue:

Movie

Book

This doesn't happen.

There is more conversation between everyone. Harrys sons tease each other and the trio joke about Ron being able to pass a muggle driving test. They also mention Teddy, Lupins son, and Neville being a professor at Hogwarts. The trio and Draco acknowledge each other with a head nod.
